TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于呈现具有视觉样式的文本框控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a text box control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可用于呈现使用操作系统当前视觉样式的文本框控件的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 这是很有用，如果您正在绘制的自定义控件应具有的当前视觉样式外观。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制的文本框中，请使用其中一个方法。To draw a text box, use one of the methods. 这些方法提供的各种选项，如应用文本格式或指定文本边界。These methods provide a variety of options, such as applying text formatting or specifying text bounds. 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区将绘制包含当前视觉样式的文本框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, will draw the text box with the current visual style. 否则为将引发。Otherwise, will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，你可以检查的值属性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类将包装的功能设置为的元素之一类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件方法，以便绘制的文本框。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the method to draw a text box. 该控件还允许用户选择其中一个要应用于文本的值框的文本。The control also allows the user to select one of the values to apply to the text box text. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 绘制具有操作系统的当前视觉样式的文本框控件。

span.span: Draws a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system.

param.name: state
param.span: 值之一，它指定文本框的可视状态。

span.span: Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法之前，应验证属性返回`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.

exception.span: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 类是否可用于绘制具有视觉样式的文本框。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a text box with visual styles.

value.span: 如果用户已在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, .
